entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:21 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
